title: Issue with constant disconnects in certain games.
body:
I have been issue with constant disconnects these past few days. There are games where the ping is normal and then there are games where I constantly disconnect, reconnecting with double my ping. Below are the list of things I have done on my end to fix my problem:

1. I have disabled "Allow the computer to turn of this device to conserve power" for my network adapter,
2. I have updated my network adapter,
3. I have set up WiFi range extenders from the router to my room,
4. I am using the "WLAN Optimizer" software,
5. I have run the "Hextech repair tools" in administrator mode (firewall exceptions, system clock sync apply here).

I have yet to try 
1. Directly connecting to the router,
2. Re patching the game,
3. Re installing the game.

To clarify: I have no issues when not playing the game i.e. browsing the store, main home page, summoner profile.

Is there anything else I might be able to try ? I hope this issue gets resolved soon. Happy ten years Riot games.

replies.body: It does sound like your network is having problems staying connected, and you've done well to troubleshoot that so far.  I suggest also following each step of our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to supplement your troubleshooting.  Make sure to go over each one there, because even if your net is fine elsewhere you can still have problems specifically with the game server.  Let me know if you have any questions!

Hello, I would like to divert your attention to this discussion.

[Link](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report/9FEhHPl9-attempting-to-reconnct)

It sound similar to the issue I have been experiencing, thank you for your work.
Thank you for your reply but I've been led to believe that the issue may be with my hardware or system (localized problem). I will be following the guide you posted, hopefully it gets resolved soon.

same here. gonna quit if i can't find a solution soon because it's unplayable. I've already tried the disabling ip-helper solution, and it doesn't help. This is not an issue with my internet connection. No other games experience this problem.
